How it works

Complete a Dental Checkup with you smartphone in 3 easy steps:

Upload 5 images of your Teeth

SnapSmile uses your smartphone's advanced camera to capture ultra high-quality images of your teeth from 5 angles. Leveraging our experienced dental team and artificial intelligence, SnapSmile analyzes and assesses each photo to identify potential oral health issues and indicators.

Personalized Oral Health Insights, Outside the Clinic

SnapSmile generates custom recommendations based on your oral health and preferences. Oral health is a combination of at-home and in-clinic care. Our recommendations cover both, so you can confidently improve your oral health with your new insights.

Monitor and Improve your Oral Health for Life

Using SnapSmile periodically will help prevent new dental issues from happening, slow down or eliminate progression of existing issues, and build a stronger and healthier smile for life.
